subject: Re: [junit] Re: How can I get Junit Test to run in parallel threads?
msgSnippet: ... I expect neither.  I developed JUnitPerf because it scratched an itch of mine at the time.  Offering it as open source was a way for me to give back a
messageBody:
David Vydra wrote:

>Mike,
>
>I am very curious about your position. Do you expect renumeration
>from commercial vendors, or is it an issue of respect? I've released
>several open source products, none as cool as your :), and I am faced
>with the same dilemma.
>
>

I expect neither. I developed JUnitPerf because it scratched an itch of
mine at the time. Offering it as open source was a way for me to give
back a little to the community.

Mike

--
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting Inc.
http://www.clarkware.com
